alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:02PM MST until July 17 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... * Until 745 PM MST. * At 701 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cutter, or 9 miles east of Globe, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Globe and Cutter. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 251 and 263, and between mile markers 267 and 268. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 268. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 168 and 170. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
